National_City.Spreckels Mansion:
The Spreckels Mansion is a historic mansion in Coronado, California.


== Location ==
The mansion is located at 1630 Glorietta Boulevard in Coronado, California, and is currently operated as the Glorietta Bay Inn.


== History ==
It was designed by architect Harrison Albright and built for John D. Spreckels (1853-1926), heir to the Spreckels Sugar Company fortune, in 1907.
